title: New: VÉRITÉ – Echo
content:
Having made her live debut last month for Neon Gold, Brooklyn’s VÉRITÉ is set to hit CMJ in a few weeks time, with her first EP released a few days beforehand.

Featuring the previous Hype Machine popular Strange Enough and Weekend, alongside new track, Echo, it’s one of the most impressive breakthrough EP’s of the year, and marks her out as one of the brightest stars to keep an eye out for in 2015.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
